content:
As an AI language model, I don't have access to current data that can tell me which particular social media platform BBC2 focuses on more than others. However, the BBC has a presence on several social media platforms, including Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and YouTube, among others, and it uses each platform differently to cater to its audience.

For instance, on Twitter, BBC2 often posts breaking news updates, live-tweets events like award shows or sports games, and shares links to articles and videos. On Facebook, BBC2 shares longer-form content, including video clips, articles, and behind-the-scenes looks at programming. On Instagram, BBC2 shares visually stunning images and clips related to its programming.

So, it seems that BBC2 tailors its content and approach to each social media platform to reach its target audience effectively. However, the BBC may prioritize certain platforms more than others based on user engagement, analytics and trends, and any new features or updates that could benefit their overall social media strategy.
